descriptionHtml:
NEW VERSION HERE:  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13394



Godlike Dragonpriests
 ====================================================================================
THIS ISN\'T MADE FOR BALANCE, BUT FOR FUN!
=====================================================================================

1.Description
2.What this mod does
3.Installation
4.Compatibility
5.Credits


1.  Description

Ever wanted a fight? a real fight? 
As there are only 8 dragon priests i always saw them as the special enemy monster #1 in skyrim and i wanted them more \"special\". So here we go.

2. What this mod does

This plugin will turn dragonpriests into the pinnacle of all enemies in skyrim. They will use masterlevel destruction spells, are two times faster and got their hp raised through the roof (yea no more \"i oneshotted him with a x30 sneak attack\" cheesyness).

They have now 9000 HP up from 1490 and use (for some unknown reason to me) 90% of all times lightning storm instead of fire storm or blizzard, they still use their normal attacks like staffs incinerate and so on . A word of warning though, lightning storm ignores resistance with this plugin. 
If you see the dragonpriest doing nothing for around 2-3 seconds, i recommend to seek cover.

3. Installation
Paste the Godlike Dragonpriests.esp into your Data folder and activate it in the skyrim launcher.

4. Compatibility

I\'ve only tweaked vanilla settings here, but i dare to say this will conflict with anything that modifies Dragonpriests (except textures of course).

5. Credits
Kudos to Bethesda for making another awesome game in the TES series. - Skyrim.
author: Acran2004
